item.description:
Join us to learn how to SHOP FOR FREE!  Author and coupon guru Kathy Spencer will join us on April 5th to teach you how to get something for nothing!

As the cost of gasoline, food and clothing continues to rise learn the secrets that smart women have been using to get food, toiletries and almost anything else for free.

Space is limited so I encourage you to register early for this event!

Refreshments will be served and all guests will walk away with an initial stash of coupons and some great prizes!
item.why: If you are feeling the pinch of increased gasoline costs, food and clothings costs then I urge you to come to this special event for DARE Members!

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: Special Event with Kathy Spencer on How To Shop For Free
